body: Addressed @penev92's comments, and extended the map ctor cleanup by removing the bogus stub constructor.
You still need to fix the StyleCop error though.

I did fix it.

Edit: Oh, there's a new one now.
Travis failed downloading from GitHub, restarted it and found a new one.

Crashes reproducibly when creating a new map using the editor:


Oops, I introduced that when removing the stub map constructor.  Fixed.
I can't spot any regressions. Tested the map editor, in-game radar and bridges. :white_check_mark:
